directions.text: Tear the chicken from the bones and set aside.
Set oven to 400 degrees, and cook carrots on sheet for 20 mins, leave oven on.
In a deep pan cook diced celery and onions with butter, for 5 mins.
Add in the flour and curry and cook for 2 mins
Add in the broth and milk, and cook until thickened.
Add in parsley, salt, pepper, carrots, and chicken, cook for a minute.
Pour into a shallow 2 quart baking pan.
Roll out the puff pastry in a rolling pin, score with a fork.
Cut round pastry pieces with a cookie cutter and lay on top of chicken mixture.
Cook dish for 25 mins, let stand for 7 mins.
